metadata.description: In the crumbling, chaotic city now known as Rotten Apple, San Gee is hired by religious fanatics to find a lost, sacred artifact called the Bleeding Rockbut other strange sell-swords are also on the hunt for the priceless relic! Collects stories from _Dark Horse Presents_ #2-#5. A manic, _Cannonball Run_-style race for a mystical relic by Sanford Greene!
metadata.name: Rotten Apple
